Early Detection Saves Lives

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2057&user=10620> 	

Early detection of breast cancer increases chances of recovery. Visit the free and private one-on-one clinical screenings available in all offices and warehouses to get checked. 

Women‚Äôs health consultations will also be available, covering menopause, fertility, hormonal balance, and more.
Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2057&user=10620>  for more details

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Cyber Security Kiosk
